stimulusHtml: One interpretation of Andy Warhol’s Marilyn Diptych asserts that the artist intended to elevate the status of his subject to that of a religious icon by the use of a diptych format; another interpretation argues that the artist no longer viewed painting as a fine art distinct from popular culture because of the work’s
choicesHtml: abrupt variations of color found throughout the composition
multiple references to mechanical forms of reproduction
heightened contrast and realistic detailing in each portrait
combination of diverse painting styles or techniques
